general.description: Research spanning 20 years proves PDFs are problematic for online reading. Yet they’re still prevalent and users continue to get lost in them. They’re unpleasant to read and navigate and remain unfit for digital-content display.
general.title: PDF: Still Unfit for Human Consumption, 20 Years Later

openGraph.title: PDF: Still Unfit for Human Consumption, 20 Years Later
